expo.name: Parenting App
expo.description: Your trusted companion for the parenting journey. Get personalized guidance, track milestones, and connect with expert advice.

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to upload images for AI-powered parenting advice.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take photos for AI-powered parenting advice.

plugins.photosPermission: This app needs access to your photo library to upload images for AI-powered parenting advice.
plugins.cameraPermission: This app needs access to your camera to take photos for AI-powered parenting advice.
